author: jemenger
content:
<@!291925846556540928> or <@!191378736254287874>, where should I propose additions to the channels? 

I want to request that we add a channel for R&D teams to coordinate on L2s for designs and deployments of bridges, composability, etc. Perhaps the channel should be placed under "Eth1", or "Eth1-Eth2". The name might simply be "L2s".

author: hudsonjameson
content:
<@250259755484839957> you can propose them here. I think if we were to make a channel for L2 coordination it would be in Eth1, but I'm not sure invested in which category it goes in. <@250259755484839957> have other teams or people reached out asking for this type of coordination? I'm worried we would create a channel without enough buy in and participation for it.

<@291925846556540928>: what do you think of adding the channel?

author: jemenger
content: Mainly I am reacting to the general interest I see in it from Twitter, and of course Vitalik's "A rollup-centric ethereum roadmap" post on the EthMagicians Forum. I was looking around to where people come together on this and could not find any live discussion channel.
